Html:
Hey :)

I use Vb.net 2010 express and i've just found your control 

i just can't get it work

i think the problem is in this line

Mainmap.MapProvider = MapProviders.GoogleMapProvider.WebProxy

plzz help :p

WebProxy ;}

man, you just do: Mainmap.MapProvider = MapProviders.GoogleMap;

didn't work with   : Mainmap.MapProvider = MapProviders.GoogleMap

but it works with  : Mainmap.MapProvider = MapProviders.GoogleMapProvider.Instance

Thank you for yur help
sorry: MainMap.MapProvider = GMapProviders.GoogleMap;

with : Mainmap.MapProvider = GMapProviders.GoogleMap it gives me 

'GMapProviders' n'est pas déclaré. Il peut être inaccessible en raison de son niveau de protection

'GMapProviders' is not declared , maybe because of its protection level

add:

using GMap.NET.MapProviders;

Ty so much RadioMan , it works :) :)

i have other questions i wish u have time for me :)
How to surf in the map using mouse (up,down,left,right) like in googleMaps ?
surf ;} you mean drag?

srry for my bad english :p :p

yes its drag :) , how to do it ??

i found it lol 

Mainmap.DragButton = MouseButtons.Left
